Name: MiniState
About the game: Welcome to the multiplayer, open-world of MiniState. Wage war, trade, and build alliances to build the greatest nation the world will ever know. PERSISTENCE: All players coexist in a single, massive, ever-expanding world. The world is never reset, allowing nations to stand the test of time. EXPAND: Collect resources and construct new, impressive structures over the days, weeks, and months. WARFARE: Fight battles on instanced maps. Plan your attacks and prepare your defenses! TRADE: Trade with your neighbors to gain the upper hand. Monopolize rare resources and conquer vital waterways to control global trade. DIPLOMACY: Establish a federation to unite your friends into a single mighty empire. CUSTOMIZATION: Create custom national anthems, flags, and leader profiles to make the nation yours.
Meta Title: MiniState: Feb 20, 2020, Nalu Zou and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MiniState? Check out the release date (Feb 20, 2020), developer insights from Nalu Zou, and a complete game summary.
